module.name: rsync
module.summary: Fast incremental file transfer for synchronization

interface.name: rsync_entry_type
interface.summary: Make rsync an entry point for the specified domain.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The domain for which init scripts are an entrypoint.

interface.name: rsync_entry_spec_domtrans
interface.summary: Execute a rsync in a specified domain.

desc.p: Execute a rsync in a specified domain.
No interprocess communication (signals, pipes, etc.) is provided by this interface since the domains are not owned by this module.

interface.name: rsync_entry_domtrans
interface.summary: Execute a rsync in a specified domain.

desc.p: Execute a rsync in a specified domain.
No interprocess communication (signals, pipes, etc.) is provided by this interface since the domains are not owned by this module.

interface.name: rsync_exec
interface.summary: Execute rsync in the caller domain domain.

desc.p: Allow rsync to modify public files used for public file transfer services.
